ValidationRule.description: You do not have access to the this Complaint type. Please contact your system admin.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(!ISPICKVAL(RW_Complaint_Type__c, "Post Possession Related"), ISPICKVAL(RW_RM_Name__c, "Aaliya Kirkire"), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_case == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to this Complaint type. Please contact your system admin.
